OOC: well, that really screws me up considering he was in the base. Cancel that post about meeting Galvatron, I guess it's null and void.
Rancor:
     "Grrrraargh!" He yelled into the air. Then he thought to himself Why do I keep geting sent around? He began to track Galvatron's location, in beast mode.
 aerosmith60@... wrote:OOC: sorry i got distracted by the battle posts i missed this one hes not at the base hes a couple miles away at the tripred base  fighting megs he told him to go there. The base's shields and autoguns are on so watch out.
